background.title: Background Questions
background.description: Please answer the following questions honestly. False information may result in your application being refused.
background.disclaimer: These questions are required by UK immigration authorities. Answer truthfully.

criminal.question: Have you ever been convicted of a criminal offence in any country?
criminal.help: Include all convictions, even if considered 'spent' or minor

immigration.question: Have you ever breached immigration laws in any country?
immigration.help: This includes overstaying visas or working without permission

refusal.question: Have you ever been refused entry to or deported from any country?
refusal.help: Include any country, not just the UK

terrorism.question: Have you ever been involved in or supported terrorist or extremist activities?
terrorism.help: This includes any form of involvement or support

background.warning: Providing false information is a criminal offence and may result in prosecution.

errors.criminalRequired: Please answer the criminal conviction question
